argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | hdmapipcl.h | |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) |
| 2 |  | hdmapipcl.u | |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) |
| 3 |  | hdmapipcl.v | |- V = ( Base ` U ) |
| 4 |  | hdmapipcl.r | |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) |
| 5 |  | hdmapipcl.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 6 |  | hdmapipcl.s | |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) |
| 7 |  | hdmapipcl.k | |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) |
| 8 |  | hdmapipcl.x | |- ( ph -> X e. V ) |
| 9 |  | hdmapipcl.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) ) = ( Base ` ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) ) |
| 12 | 1, 2, 3, 10, 11, 6, 7, 9 | #P_hdmapcl | |- ( ph -> ( S ` Y ) e. ( Base ` ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) ) ) |
| 13 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 10, 11, 7, 12, 8 | #P_lcdvbasecl | |- ( ph -> ( ( S ` Y ) ` X ) e. B ) |
